thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 2 of 791
thread.title: Ally S

author: Ally S
title: Ally S
text:
Hired a car for the week. cheap and was happy enough. As it was for business needed a VAT receipt. Asked via their website and returned a day later to see they had closed it without sending said invoice or even acknowledging my request.
SO I am now out of pocket as my company wont refund without an invoice. Would I use this lot again? Nope, sorry. Any company who does this isn't worth the time!
